title: Denton, Texas
summary: Denton is a city in and the county seat of Denton County, Texas, United States. With a population of 139,869 as of 2020,[10] it is the 27th-most populous city in Texas, the 197th-most populous city in the United States, and the 12th-most populous city in the Dallasâ€“Fort Worth metroplex.
